domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@ChrisCJackson Yeah. But at least there are few signs of major Covid19 morbidity indicators at Trump rallies, such as: diabetes, hyper-tension, and >60 years old.

So, they should be good for all the high fives and other interactive hijinks.
